EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Hortonworks_Future of Data Roadshow(HFDR)_Q3-416.Invite - Paris 8-3
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us in Paris for the Hortonworks Future of Data Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://hortonworks.com/roadshow/?utm_campaign=roadshow2016-paris&utm_medium=email&utm_source=pivotal#paris]]>
Hello,
We invite you to join Pivotal in Paris on 15 September for the Hortonworks Future of Data Roadshow <[[http://hortonworks.com/roadshow/?utm_campaign=roadshow2016-paris&utm_medium=email&utm_source=pivotal#paris]]>.
Spend the day with us in Paris for content-rich sessions on Powering the Future of Data™, Open and Connected Data Platforms, Data-in-Motion, Data-at-Rest, and Modern Data Applications.
Discover how you can create actionable intelligence through 100% open source architectures for the modern enterprise. Every journey begins with a single step, and our roadshow is an engaging and informative way to start that step. If you are a data business or technical decision maker, you won’t want to miss your stop!
Register now <[[http://hortonworks.com/roadshow/?utm_campaign=roadshow2016-paris&utm_medium=email&utm_source=pivotal#paris]]>
See you there! The Pivotal Team
